title: Barstool Sports Presents: Spittin' Chiclets Episode One
description:
In the first episode as part of the Barstool Sports network, Rear Admiral of Barstool Boston and former NHL-er and Team USA member Ryan Whitney discuss all the going-ons in the NHL. In this episode they talk Auston Matthews hot start, if the Bruins are to too slow for the modern NHL, Sidney Crosby's concussion and much more. Download, listen, rate and smash that subscribe button.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
